Title: Operation Petticoat
Writer: Stanley Shapiro (screenplay), Maurice Richlin (screenplay), Paul King (suggested by a story by), Joseph Stone (suggested by a story by)
Actors: Cary Grant, Tony Curtis, Joan O'Brien, Dina Merrill
Plot: During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
